content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe in your own words one of the author’s claims regarding the revolutionary transformation of Europe between 1789 and 1848. b) Identify one piece of evidence not found in the passage that would support the author’s argument regarding a social effect of industrialization. c) Explain how the author's Marxist point of view shapes his interpretation of industrial capitalism.
